title: After getting perma banned all the money you spent is gone
body: I’ve worked jobs from hours and hours on end and I’ve had nothing to spend it on so I’ve spent over legit 1000$ on league and it got banned, I don’t think it’s right for riot to take you’re money and then if you get banned you just don’t get it back, I think they’re should be a refund thing, am I wrong

replies.body: Purchasing Riot Points is a non-refundable transaction. It says so in the Client, and it says so on the back of pre-paid Riot Point cards. Once you've purchased Riot Points, the money spent belongs to Riot and they aren't obligated to refund it, particularly not to players who broke the rules of their game to the point of having their account permanently suspended.

There are two ways to look at it that might make you feel better. Because in my opinion people spamming the ToS doesn't make anyone feel better.

1) Riot never sells you anything. They are only letting you **rent** the skins and champions and other things you spend RP on. Now that your account is gone, your rental period is over. 

2) Riot sells you the skin for RP on a per match basis. They charge you every match that you use the skin, that way there is no way to get ripped off in the instance of a ban. However, because Rito are nice guys, they only charge you for the first use of the skin. Every subsequent use is a freebie. Whether you get banned after the 1st time using the skin or 1 millionth, you still aren't paying any more than what you are getting.

Hope that helps!
